name: Light Keeper 2
description:
As the queen embarks on a suicide mission to light the torches that have gone out for mysterious reasons, her sister takes over the defenses of the city of Farzin to resist as long as possible and buy time for the queen.

Your goal is to survive as many waves as you and the people of Farzin can withstand, bosses and special events can happen between waves.

 Online Ranking with the 10 best survivors in the Main Menu.

At the end of each Wave, you must choose one of 4 random advances that will help you in your fight.

 Wide variety of skills and upgrades.

 Random events between waves.

 Random bosses after the fifth wave.

 You will not fight alone! the people of Farzim will also help you to defend the city.

 Some just want to take advantage of the situation by attacking both sides!

 Click to perform a basic attack.

 Click to perform a special attack.

 Change skill selection (Numeric keys 1 to 4 also switch).

 Player movement.

 Open the window with your character's attributes and configure your skill bar.

 Skills that launch projectiles use the cursor as a crosshair, so don't forget to aim at your target before using the skill!

 Melee skills use the side of the cursor as a crosshair, so before attacking, place the cursor on the side you want the character to attack!

 The effectiveness of most skills depends on your stats, some depend on your Conviction and Intellect stat and some depend on your Min Attack and Max Attack!

OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 or 32) 

PROCESSOR: A Dual-Core third generation processor or better 

RAM: 4GB 

GPU: Graphic Card with 512mb VRAM or better 

STORAGE: 200mb

Internet connection is required to load the Ranking and add new results.
